topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0: vmWare Installation Workaround

body.p: When powering on the ESX Compute Proxy VM, you might receive a VMK_NO_MEMORY error. This is a known problem with HP server and ESXi 5.x.
For more information on the known problem, see the vmWare Knowledge Base: http://kb.vmware.com/selfservice/microsites/search.do?language=en_US&cmd=displayKC&externalId=2085618
This issue occurs with ESXi hosts running on HP hardware with these versions of HP Agentless Management Service.
HP Agentless Management Service (AMS) is a service that provides support for Agentless Management and Active Health.
Execute the following command on the ESX and vCenter server to determine the version of hp-ams.
To fix this issue, upgrade to HP AMS version 10.0.1 and above.
To download HP AMS version 10.0.1, see https://h20566.www2.hpe.com/hpsc/swd/public/detail?swItemId=MTX_b05d4c644fb742aa87cb5f5da1&lang=en-us&cc=us. This page also contains installation instructions.

p.i: Return to installing the non-KVM region for the memphis or sacramento template.
